author: Jessica
excerpt: 1. Very excited for our advent spiral this year. And advent calendar tradition! 2. Oh my word. Croissant stuffing!!! I need this in my light. 3. As much as I hate nearly every fashion trend that has come back in style, I’m sort of into the stirrup pants… yep. 4. 2 questions to ask […]
text: 1. Very excited for our advent spiral this year. And advent calendar tradition! 2. Oh my word. Croissant stuffing!!! I need this in my light. 3. As much as I hate nearly every fashion trend that has come back in style, I’m sort of into the stirrup pants… yep. 4. 2 questions to ask yourself everyday. 5. If you need a little holiday treat, the favorite day peppermint bark ice cream is out of this world. 6. Not much sounds worse to me than pizza hut tomato wine. 7. TV things! That Yellowstone episode was crazy. Not shocked. Landman!!! Oh my gosh, it’s so good. We love it. I also watched the JonBenet doc. 8. I am in love with my gift guides this year, it’s like a compilation of all my favorite things. I also made a list of black friday week and the deals on items I love are incredible. 9. Milk or dark chocolate? I choose milk almost every time.
html:
1. Very excited for our advent spiral this year. And advent calendar tradition!

2. Oh my word. Croissant stuffing!!! I need this in my light.

3. As much as I hate nearly every fashion trend that has come back in style, I’m sort of into the stirrup pants… yep.

4. 2 questions to ask yourself everyday.

5. If you need a little holiday treat, the favorite day peppermint bark ice cream is out of this world.

6. Not much sounds worse to me than pizza hut tomato wine.

7. TV things! That Yellowstone episode was crazy. Not shocked. Landman!!! Oh my gosh, it’s so good. We love it. I also watched the JonBenet doc.

8. I am in love with my gift guides this year, it’s like a compilation of all my favorite things. I also made a list of black friday week and the deals on items I love are incredible.

9. Milk or dark chocolate? I choose milk almost every time.
